comment.author: 23206131@N06
comment._content: The Lawrence textile strike was a strike of immigrant workers in Lawrence, Massachusetts in 1912 led by the Industrial Workers of the World. Check it out on wikipedia at: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawrence_textile_strike

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information and for citing your source.  We’ll look into it.
